Subject: RE: [eqbards] Hey this sounded interesting..
<snip>

Um, almost all the other discussion I see on this list is
about how to play your bard better or what to expect at later
levels. Aside from a few rants that span a few posts, and a
few attempts at meta-issue discussion I've tried to start
which promptly got kabonged :-), the only exception I've seen
is for what to put in the petition we're sending to Verant.

--
John H. Kim
